section.title: RCC_ClkInitTypeDef Struct Reference

para.para: RCC System, AHB and APB busses clock configuration structure definition.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: RCC System, AHB and APB busses clock configuration structure definition.

section.section:
Field Documentation
AHBCLKDivider AHBCLKDividerRCC_ClkInitTypeDef RCC_ClkInitTypeDefAHBCLKDivider
uint32_t AHBCLKDivider
The AHB clock (HCLK) divider. This clock is derived from the system clock (SYSCLK). This parameter can be a value of AHB Clock Source
APB1CLKDivider APB1CLKDividerRCC_ClkInitTypeDef RCC_ClkInitTypeDefAPB1CLKDivider
uint32_t APB1CLKDivider
The APB1 clock (PCLK1) divider. This clock is derived from the AHB clock (HCLK). This parameter can be a value of APB1 APB2 Clock Source
APB2CLKDivider APB2CLKDividerRCC_ClkInitTypeDef RCC_ClkInitTypeDefAPB2CLKDivider
uint32_t APB2CLKDivider
The APB2 clock (PCLK2) divider. This clock is derived from the AHB clock (HCLK). This parameter can be a value of APB1 APB2 Clock Source
ClockType ClockTypeRCC_ClkInitTypeDef RCC_ClkInitTypeDefClockType
uint32_t ClockType
The clock to be configured. This parameter can be a value of System Clock Type
SYSCLKSource SYSCLKSourceRCC_ClkInitTypeDef RCC_ClkInitTypeDefSYSCLKSource
uint32_t SYSCLKSource
The clock source (SYSCLKS) used as system clock. This parameter can be a value of System Clock Source
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file: Drivers/STM32F1xx_HAL_Driver/Inc/stm32f1xx_hal_rcc.h
